item.title: ansible elasticsearch
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description: --- # =========================================================================== # Do basic setup on all hosts # =========================================================================== - hosts: all become: true gather_facts: false tasks: - name: "SSH should be available." become: false delegate_to: localhost wait_for: port: 22 host: '{{ ansible_host }}' search_regex: "OpenSSH" delay: 1 timeout: 300 - name: "The ansible facts should be gathered for later." setup: - name: "Our servers should be known by name." lineinfile: dest: /etc/hosts line: '{{ hostvars[item].ansible_host }} {{item}}' with_items: '{{ groups["all"] }}' - name: "A 'ping' via DNS name should be possible.
